[DQR.IFRS.0102.9541] Schulden with a value of 7,056,700,000 is not equal to the combined total of Current Liabilities and Noncurrent Liabilites ( 3,631,100,000 + 2,169,900,000 ) with a value of 5,801,000,000.
These values should be equal. The properties of this ifrs-full:Liabilities fact are: Period :2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of Liabilities : -5 Decimals of Current Liabilities : -5 Decimals of Non Current Liabilities : -5
Rule Element Id:9541 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/549300VZKC61IR5U8G96/2021-12-31/ESEF/AT/1/Andritz_Jahresfinanzbericht_2021_ESEF.zip/Andritz_Jahresfinanzbericht_2021_ESEF/reports/Andritz_Jahresfinanzbericht_2021_ESEF.xhtml 9756

[DQR.IFRS.0102.9541] Schulden with a value of 7,672,800,000 is not equal to the combined total of Current Liabilities and Noncurrent Liabilites ( 4,177,800,000 + 1,927,700,000 ) with a value of 6,105,500,000.
These values should be equal. The properties of this ifrs-full:Liabilities fact are: Period :2021-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of Liabilities : -5 Decimals of Current Liabilities : -5 Decimals of Non Current Liabilities : -5

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 01 - KONZERN-GEWINN- UND VERLUSTRECHNUNG but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -
